Reviews.AuthorLocation: New Port Richey, Florida, United States
Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay - saved our vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after running away from the horrible Americano two doors down. The hotel staff is wonderful and very caring. The grounds are clean and well-maintained, and the amenities are very good. There is a nice heated indoor pool with access to the outside patio, and a small cafe that serves breakfast and lunch until 2 pm. The outside patio and pool has pavers and a glass fence so as not to block the ocean views. Ocean access is down about ten concrete steps to the beach, and there is a shower head at the bottom by your feet to wash off the sand. There's another outside shower just inside the gate on the pool deck. On the way to the outside pool, there are newer vending machines for soda, snacks, and ice cream; as well as an ice machine. There is a rack with clean pool towels, and a hamper for your used towels. Our room was oceanfront with a good-sized balcony. The only bad thing I can say is that the room air conditioner drains onto the balcony, so there is always a little water trail. Not their fault- it's no big deal. The room was nicely updated and very clean. There was a fully stocked kitchenette with a large refrigerator. The bathroom was also updated and well-lit. We had two double beds, while we only slept on one, it was very comfortable. We had already booked our stay for next month's Biketoberfest prior to this unexpected stay based on the reviews, and are very happy that we did. This will be the place we stay in Daytona from now on. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “great place.great people!”
Reviews.Author: kevin g
Reviews.Content: Just spent Labor Day weekend and I must say the place was FANTASTIC! we had oceanfront and the view was terrific.The room was clean and the staff very helpful.Only drawback was water saving showerhead.....We will be back !

Reviews.Title: “A Bang for your Bucks!”
Reviews.Author: Neanfitforlife
Reviews.Content: Nice and clean family owned/operated hotel. Not your top notch but totally acceptable (NO BUGS) and the customer services is to DIE FOR!!! Gwen at the front desk, WOW is all I'm saying she's full of imformation and if she doesn't know. Oh no worries, she'll take the extra step to find whatever it is you are in need of. She's truly a gem along with the others (cleaning crew/kitchen & pool crew) excellent group of folks. The only downside that I encountered was the shower pressure wasn't up enough. The water was hot but the pressure was very low. Carpet in elevators could be replaced but other than that I was VERY HAPPY!!! I'll be back again and again...!!! Thanks for making my 46 birthday trip a delightful one...

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Trip w/ Family”
Reviews.Author: FL_Traveler80
Reviews.Content: Had an excellant stay here! We opted for the Ocean View because of the slightly lower price, it does face the nieghboring hotel but the size of the room more than makes up for it, still a wonderful view and breeze off the ocean. Facilities were nice, employees were great! Stayed here with multiple family members in multiple rooms, we had no complaints at all. Most of the family members booked the Ocean Front rooms, which were a little smaller but come with fully equipped kitchenette. Definitely would recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Hidden gem it is!”
Reviews.Author: hockeygirl0331
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a 4 day stay - ended up in Daytona after leaving Miami trying to escape Tropical Storm Isaac. After having just stayed 1 night at a cockroach hotel down the street, we were extremely picky about this hotel. Room and hotel are extremely clean. Everything looked freshly painted, new and/or well kept up. Ms. Gwen at the front desk is a sweetheart and very helpful. The little restaurant in the hotel had good food at a reasonable price. Only thing I can think of would be putting safes in the room. Will definitely go back if in Daytona area again - which by the way, Daytona has greatly improved since the last time we were there in 2008.

Reviews.Title: “The hidden gem of Daytona Beach!!”
Reviews.Author: pmcraig67
Reviews.Content: We totally give Tropical Winds a 10 out of 10!! Each year we come back and it's still as great as the year before! One of the best things we really like is to see some of the same staff members year after year. Seeing Gwen at the front desk is great! She knows who we are and we really appreciate that. The hotel is very clean and the oceanfront rooms are great, even though I recommend the rooms with two double beds. We got a king bed room this year and it did not have the full size fridge like we had last year. That really helped us with storing water and extra food we had with us. The little cafe is great for breakfast...prices are good and the staff is friendly. So, I'm sure we will be back again and again!

Reviews.Title: “Had a great one night stay”
Reviews.Author: Vegasbaby1968
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based off reviews from Trip Advisor and glad I did. First time staying here, got the room for $89 plus tax a night on a Friday but did not get an additional discount being that I'm a Florida resident but that's ok. This was still a good deal for what we got....Asked for a higher floor upon check in and got the 7th floor (out of 8) with 2 beds, flat screen TV on the wall, microwave/fridge, sliding glass door with private balcony and awesome view of the Atlantic. This is an older property but very well maintained. There is an outdoor and indoor pool, both clean. Lots of loungers and access from the pool deck down to the beach. Front desk agents were very nice and welcoming. Will definetly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Ewwww stay elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: Matthew O
Reviews.Content: This place is quite rundown and poorly maintained. The room had holes in the wall, the ceilling and very old beds. The linens were yellowed and the halls smelled horrible..... Stay elsewhere!! Looks like the hotel spent all of their budget on a camera system instead of repairing their property

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't Ask for anymore”
Reviews.Author: larry51347
Reviews.Content: Hotel was extremely clean and pretty much up to date. Staff was very friendly and truly seem to appreciate everyones patronage. The pool area was very nice and the entire propery is well maintained. We had a large ocean view room with a balcony which gave us a great view of the ocean. We had breakfast in the small restaurant in the hotel and found it to have great food at a reasonable price. Will stay here again when we return to the area.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Daytona Beach for this price range!”
Reviews.Author: stroper1982
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel in Daytona Beach for this price range. It's an older hotel, but it is very well maintained and the rooms are up to date and very clean. This hotel has the best staff of ANY hotel I've ever stayed at. Gwen at the front desk is wonderful and does everything she can to make your stay enjoyable. We requested the 7th floor in advance and that's what we got. I recommend the 7th floor because the housekeeping is the best on this floor. Kirsten is an awesome and honest housekeeper and cleaned the room better than any housekeeper has at any hotel I've stayed at, including 5 star resorts!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice oceanfront hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Kim K
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great find for myself and my husband. We had a king size, oceanview room. It was set up a little different than a traditional hotel room and we loved it. There was plenty of extra space. The balcony was on the side of the building but we still had a terrific view of the ocean. The pool area was very nice and it was just steps away from the ocean. It was also a little further down from the boardwalk area so it was nice and quiet. We would definately stay there again with or without the kids.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place on the ocean”
Reviews.Author: Leea2013
Reviews.Content: An older hotel that is def showing it's wear and tear, but love the location w/ the balcony on the beach. The pool was nice at the beginning of the week, though was kind of questionable the time we left...very cloudy~ The kitchen was adequate, but only 2 forks one knife and no can opener! Glad we brought plastic wares with us. Staff is very friendly and seemed pleased that you were there. I would stay again! PS....if you go to the boardwalk, try to find parking on the street as the lot charges $10! Total rip off!!

Reviews.Title: “Tropical Winds vacation”
Reviews.Author: Liz U
Reviews.Content: For the past 15 years, I have been visiting Daytona Beach, at least once a year. I've stayed at several of the hotels along the shoreline, and the Tropical Winds is, by far, my favorite. Firstly, we arrived at the hotel late in the evening, after a long day of travel, and the man at the front desk, Bob, was an absolute pleasure to deal with. He was fun and funny, and checked us into our room in less than 3 minutes (not an exaggeration) because he already had our keys set aside for us prior to our arrival. When we got to the room, we were more than pleased with its condition. It was clean and well-kept, with a kitchenette and a lovely view of the ocean. In the morning, we headed down to the on-site cafe for breakfast, which was delicious, filling, and inexpensive. I should mention that it is also adjacent to the pool deck, so access to the pool and beach are tremendously convenient. The folks in the cafe (Frank, Cam, Lily, and the cook - I apologize, I forget his name) really make you feel at home, like family. They are attentive, friendly, and efficient, and they are happy to serve you an amazing breakfast to start your day. The beach at the Tropical Winds is clean, quieter than near the boardwalk, and beautiful for swimming, laying out, or just going for a stroll. If you're looking for a bit of peace and quiet, this is the place to go. It's not a 5-star resort, so if that's what you're looking for, this is not the place for you, but the Tropical Winds is clean, comfortable, and on a less congested stretch of beach, with everything you could want (food, drinks, groceries, etc.) within a mile or so, all for a reasonable price. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay on a Budget!”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: If your goal is to enjoy yourself and who you are with by the pool over looking the beach, this is the place to go! I loved that while laying out by the pool instead of an ugly concrete wall between you and the beach it is glass, so you can see the ocean and enjoy the scenery while staying by the pool! AND they have a little diner there that is open for breakfast and lunch. Hands Down one of the Best "vacation" Breakfasts I've had a long time! THis is not a 5 star property by any means, but on a budget you still have a nice view and the accommodations are nice too.

Reviews.Title: “A breath of floral deodorant!”
Reviews.Author: Pamela_Marie01
Reviews.Content: The rooms were large and clean. However, there was an over-powering smell of floral air freshener spray! It gave my fiance and me both headaches! We had to leave the windows open every day to try to air it out. However, the housekeeper would come by and just coat the room in the spray! This could have been to mask the smell of the garbage room that was next to ours. Either way, it was enough to want to minimize our time in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed.”
Reviews.Author: Ehoganpac
Reviews.Content: On vacation from the west coast, of florida. we decided at the last minute to head over to daytona beach. We found a coupon in the florida hotel coupon book and it was perfect. The hotel was clean, as clean as can be when you are right on the beach. Perfect location just up from the stands, with a hotel pool right on the beach. very friendly hotel staff. Our 2 girls, age 5 and 2 had a blast! Love to the beach e tropical decor in the lobby and first floor. The rooms to work clean and I felt safe sleeping on the bed. The carpet was a little stained, as was the couch. But again, i understand it's hard to keep something spotless when you are right in the sand and also dealing with the crowds that come this way.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and very clean.”
Reviews.Author: Ian H
Reviews.Content: As a frequent visitors to the Daytona area we were still looking for a reasonably priced hotel that we liked. Tropical Winds has fulfilled that purpose. The small oceanfront hotel is run very efficiently and the staff, both front desk and housekeeping, were extremely helpful and friendly. It has both an indoor and outdoor pool, as well as direct beach access. Parking and wi-fi were free. We did not visit the restaurant which closes at 6.00 p.m. It is an old hotel that has been tastefully renovated, unlike many we have visited. The outstanding feature was the cleanliness everywhere. Unless you want an expensive resort hotel I would recommend Tropical Winds.

Reviews.Title: “MISQUITO INFESTATION”
Reviews.Author: chris p
Reviews.Content: I was excited to go on vacation to Daytona mainly to sit on the balcony, relax and watch the ocean. After the first night misquitos infested the walls , and ceiling of the balcony. I went to the front desk and they said it was an act of God and their was nothing they could do about it. I sugested the spray the balcony but they insisted it would do no good. They dident offer me a different room or anything to help. I was unable to use the balcony after the first night. It was terrible. Also the room are dated and the hotel had a musty smell. I will never go back. We were so dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: “So Relaxing!!”
Reviews.Author: Karen C
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for a week, just to rest and relax, and that is exactly what we did. This hotel is clean, quiet, relaxing, and has a great ocean view. We also, liked the fact, that it had a cafe on site. The pool front cafe, was very reasonable, great food, and very friendly service. You wont go wrong, by booking your vacation stay at The Tropical Winds Oceanfront Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, clean, oceanfront!”
Reviews.Author: pharmgirl34
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Tropical Winds for 4 nights in an oceanfront efficiency. The room was large, fairly updated, had a large balcony, and was super clean. Kitchen was well stocked (dishes, pots/pans, silverware). No "beachy" smell in room and AC was fine. Public areas are well maintained and staff is great! I come to Daytona about once a year and this place is a great value for the quality you get! We will definitely stay again! Minor cons: WiFi is not great, no sharp knives in kitchen, could use a slide or something entertaining for kids at the pool area, but again, I will definitely be back! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: campbells13
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from our third vacation at Tropical Winds Resort. Great time. Start with fabulous location - right on the beach. Had coffee and watched the sun come up out of the ocean every morning. Friendly and competent staff. Start with Gwen and Christine on the front desk, right thru maintenance, restaurant, and cleaning crew. Seemed they really cared for our needs and were proud of their hotel. Good little restaurant, clean rooms, well equiped kitchen and well maintained grounds. Thanks for another very pleasant vacation folks. Dave & Barb Campbell

Reviews.Title: “REAL Oceanfront!!!”
Reviews.Author: lourdesferreiro
Reviews.Content: I have booked many places online and, when you get there, even though they said it was "oceanfront" you had to strain your neck to see the ocean. Daytona's beach is fantastic; one of the most beautiful beaches I've ever seen! This hotel is right ON the beach! The view is awesome and the room is great for the price. It has a kitchenette, which is great to have, nice beds and a clean bathroom. What more could you want? The staff is friendly and very helpful! I definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “room with a view”
Reviews.Author: nomadcastlederg
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel in September 2011.The location was perfect and the views of the Atlantic ocean were awesome.The staff were friendly and helpful.The rooms were very clean with a balcony overlooking the Atlantic ocean.The restaurant served a good breakfast overlooking the well maintained pool area with access to the most wonderful white sandy beach.

Reviews.Title: “A great place!!”
Reviews.Author: Haley P
Reviews.Content: I have had bad experiences with booking hotels online. I was very nervous about our trip to Daytona Beach. Tropical Winds was an excellent experience. It's older, but VERY clean. The staff was great. Our first night in our lovely oceanfront room with full kitchen and new flat screen tv was going well when our balcony door came off track. The next morning we mentioned it to the lady at the front desk. She told us maintainence wasn't in yet, but they would get to it soon as they can. We ran up the street and visited some surf shops, then we came back and ate a very affordable and very good breakfast at the poolside cafe. We were maybe gone and hour, went back to our room and the balcony door was fixed. Very happy with our experience.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Vacation spot”
Reviews.Author: brian t
Reviews.Content: I can not say enough about this hotel. The rooms are very clean and well maintained. The front desk was very friendly and helpful. The cafe was wonderful even going so far as to let us purchase coffee before they were open for the day. The pool and deck area was always gorgeous. The only thing we didn't like about this hotel was that we had to leave it. If you are looking for a great deal and a gorgeous hotel this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Our secret!”
Reviews.Author: dcsteve56
Reviews.Content: I have been visiting and working in Daytona beach for over 30 years and have stayed many places. About 9 years ago I discovered the Tropical Winds and try to return on each and every trip. The Atlantic Ocean is tough on beach side property’s and the TW staff works harder than any I have seen to keep up with mother nature’s work. I can't say enough about the staff, they are great. The pools are always in the best shape. The beach is never very crowded. The pier is only a healthy walk away. I highly recommend the TW for any reason!

Reviews.Title: “Not so happy”
Reviews.Author: tricia0665
Reviews.Content: I took my daughter, sisiter, and nephew th Daytona Beach for the week of spring break. I booked this room last year based on reviews. Well I don't think I had the same experience as the people in the reviews I read. The room was small and stuffy, Sticky carpet. In a five night saty the sheets were never changed, you do get a little sand in your bed even when you try hard not to and clean sheets would have been nice, WIFI never worked. I went to the desk and another guy wa standing there having the same problem, well the desk agaent looked at her phone and said she had wifi so it must be our equipment, that's it no help, then I asked again on another day and the other lady just told me it seemed to be working fine. No help there either. Just not what I expected for the money I paid. Noone seemed to be concerned that we were the guests that pay their salaries and you would think thta would try a little harder. Loved Daytona and will go back, but will NEVER stay here again. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, economical”
Reviews.Author: tbadour
Reviews.Content: What more can I say...this hotel exceeded my expectations. The more "reasonable rates" aka cheaper hotels are hit and miss but this one was a hit! We loved the pools, the view, and friendly staff behind the counter. I was especially impressed by the cleanliness. Highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price !!!”
Reviews.Content: Good location !! Away from the crow but close enough to all the fun ( 1.5 mi. From broadwalk ). The front desk personnel is just ok, they can absolutely be more friendly. The guys at the poolside cafe are FANTASTIC. Good prices 2 !!! The pool is kept well maintained. Front view means nice view. Ocean view = not too nice ( sideview) . This is the classic mid-hotel. Are you looking for a fancy hotel ? NOT for you, but if you are looking for an affordable, clean , simple stay this is a good deal. FREE PARKING ALL THE TIME :) . FREE WiFi , flat screen TV ( not many channels to choose from ). Toilets need some work. Had to flash the toilet more than twice. :( . Beds and pillows are average comfortable. Room 304 . I would stay here again !!!

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Staten Island, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “Don't understand why they don't have more stars.”
Reviews.Author: Laura G
Reviews.Content: Last time we stayed for a bike event, we stayed at the Plaza .... yes it was closer to main street, but it was loud. Tropical Winds Hotel was PERFECT! It was close enough to main street to ride, but far enough from the crowds. The rooms are updated and beautiful. They have an amazing staff. Everyone was wonderful! And the room was SO clean. I will gladly stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Should retrain the staff.”
Reviews.Author: servicenserve o
Reviews.Content: Pro: The room was clean at check in. The hotel is beach a front property. Cons : Staff needs further training on customer service and professionalism. Best if they get new employees who appreciate the opportunity of having a job . - The front desk attendant was extremely rude , I asked her a question and instead of answering the question she started arguing with me and my mother giving us attitude. Strangely enough the back door was open and what it seemed to be a manager was watching the whole thing. - Later on even though the room was ready she made us wait until 2:05 in order to check in. So she just stared at us for 15 minutes . No explanation or friendly conversation . We just stood there until 2:05 hit watching her do absolutely nothing else. -Same day we asked for towels from the front desk (same female)her respond was to search for the housekeeper working to get towels. The housekeeper only cleaned the room once out of four days , when we called the front desk to informed them ,the answer was "ok "... again we had to find the housekeeper cart in order to get clean towels and other supplies. At check out the front desk attendant was nice unprofessional , but nice .I called "boo" several times . Thankfully it was just my family and not one of my clients. I would never recommend a person to stay there and be treated this way is just not what a guest deserves and there is no traits of hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Nice...:)”
Reviews.Author: Lyk2travel
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Daytona Beach, We were there for a baseball tournament... I was a little hesitant about booking an older hotel.. Surprisingly pleased!!!...Renovated, Very clean, room was big (have stayed at bigger hotels and the rooms were not as big as these) flat screen tv and Lots of pillows , (which excited me) everybody very friendly, and no riff raff around..They also had an indoor pool, and cafe (which was good !) that served breakfast and lunch right by the pool...Free wi-fi...Video cameras in the hallways and we always saw someone cleaning..I would definitely stay here again..And it was very reasonably priced..The front desk people were very nice..Right on the beach, no long walk..Make sure you eat at Black Sheep , the food was great and had a Irish trio on Saturday night..Inlet Harbor restaurant in Ponce Inlet was awesome too!! Right on the water outdoor and indoor restaurant...Food was great!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: 25nothna
Reviews.Content: Nice small hotel with convenient parking. Clean and easy to get to pool and oceanfront. The outside oceanfront pool was surrounded by 3-foot clear glass panels so you feel like you're on the beach while at the pool. We have stayed in large oceanfront hotels in the past, and it was refreshing to stay in a smaller hotel that felt more personal. It was nice to have a kitchen area with decent appliances. The price was very reasonable too.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: Dianne G
Reviews.Content: My daughter and i stayed here recently, Very clean rooms .nice pool very close to ocean We had an oceanfront with double beds.Not to far from shops and restraunts. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. Will stay again next time...... Dianne

Reviews.Title: “great place!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: tinakillam
Reviews.Content: great, clean place to stay, the cafe was also good, will go again next year!!!! for speedweek

Reviews.Title: “nice”
Reviews.Author: ITA_And_RE_a
Reviews.Content: This was a pleasant surprise. Very reasonable rates for a room the ocean. The staff was friendly and helpful. The coffee shop serves breakfast and lunch at very reasonable prices. The hotel is older but very well kept.

Reviews.Title: “Have stayed here many times, always great!”
Reviews.Author: IndianaAllinfan
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel many times, the most recent in October 2011. The best value in Daytona Beach. The rooms and grounds are clean. The location is oceanfront with a nice pool and plenty of chairs. There is a small indoor pool as well. The on-site restaurant is open for breakfast and lunch and the prices are incredibly low. Sometimes they even sell hot dogs at lunchtime around the pool. The staff are the friendliest and most helpful you will find at any hotel. They all seem to love their job and it shows. We will continue to stay at this hotel and would recommend it to anyone traveling to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “The Cleanest Hotel in DB and the Most Friendly.”
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: We came to this hotel based on it's reviews on Tripadvisor. What we found was even better that the reviews. Safaa took our reservation at the desk by phone, her personality helped to win me over. When we checked in Ms.Gwen welcomed us at the desk with her usual humor and great greeting skills. This hotel did not have any of that musty smell you find at most beach hotels but was clean and fresh smelling, I learned later just how that came to be part of everyday life at this hotel. Ehab works in maintenance and just can't do enough for the guests at any time. Now you have to meet Christine (manager) this gal does not manage from her office, she is everywhere training, coaching and inspecting every little detail that makes for a top notch hotel for her guests. I would have to say that her high standards trickle down through the whole organization resulting in staff having great respect for her. Everywhere you look someone is shining, scrubbing and making this the best place to stay. The cafe is open from 6am until 2pm and is the most affordable eating in DB, plus you get the great humor of Frans, Billy and Cameron. These guys will make your day so make sure to start your day with a superb breakfast and a big helping of humor OR just use them as a travel guide, they are great lads. The hotel is close to attractions like the race track or what ever you may want to see, we found the location excellent.

Reviews.Title: “SO FAR BEST HOTEL IN DB”
Reviews.Author: TOM99999
Reviews.Content: Clean, friendly staff, this hotel is best located in Daytona because it's quiet!!! We recommand the Tropical Winds like a home away from home!

Reviews.Title: “Great vaction”
Reviews.Author: budda333
Reviews.Content: We are having a wonderful time at the Tropical Winds Hotel. The staff is great. Nice and clean. Every one is eager to please the guest. They have a small lobby that some of us guest gather in the evening and have a lot of cheerful times. Almost all of the rooms are ocean front. Great view. The hotel has a cafe that that is very good . It is ran by a very interesting fellow, lots of laughs, good food. Very good vacation, I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Back for more at Christmas and New Year”
Reviews.Author: KenSolihull_England
Reviews.Content: Having had a wonderful stay in August 2011, there seemed nowhere else to go for Christmas and New Year away from the cold of England, but here. We were met by the same warmth and given a superb room. All the properties of a good stay were there. This time the indoor pool had a visit and was welcome compared to temperature of the ocean. The location is really good with pleanty of places to eat locally. There is a restaurant on site which is ok, but pleanty better within a few minutes of the hotel. We hope to return again in 2012. Thank you Christine for making our stay so pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: peachygirlhartwellga
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying here and we loved it,the entire motel was so clean and staff was very friendly, especially Gwen, the folks that worked in the poolside cafe so sweet to my kids and us, even when the kids just went down to get fries, and the prices were great, we ha the sweetest maid christine, she went above and beyond her job to make our room clean and comfortable, during our stay there was a group there from Iceland and we got to meet them, it was a great experience and we had the best time, i reccomend this motel to anyone. oh and the beds were so comfortable, Becky Hayes and family

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Cross Lanes, West Virginia, United States
Reviews.Title: “You can't always go by others reviews.....”
Reviews.Author: Diana H
Reviews.Content: I just got home from my visit to Daytona Beach. I read rewiews from others after I had booked at Tropical Winds, I read some pretty neg. reviews, I started to cancel and go else where. I dont know what might have gone wrong with their visit, I can only tell you of mine. I found my room 705 to be very clean, the whole hotel was clean, every one that I came into contact with was VERY friendly and happy to help with anything that I may have needed. The pool areas were nice and clean, It was quit and very restful. I would recomend this hotel for anyone to stay at, If you are expecting a high priced resort experince, then you will have to go there and pay their price. If you are ok with a clean , quiet, friendly place to stay for a much cheaper price....this is a good place to stay!!!! I would go back there anytime !

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Vacation”
Reviews.Author: murf1001
Reviews.Content: Wow, where do I begin. This hotel went out of their way to make our stay very memorable. We had gone to Cooca Beach and hated the accommodations, we weren't slated to come here until Saturday and it was Thursday, I called the desk, got Gwen, (a gem) and told her our problem and she was able to add 2 days to the front of our reservation and told us to come on, the room would be ready. The view is spectacular, ocean front with indoor-outdoor pools, laundry facilities, reading room, restaurant, plenty of outside loungers, chairs and tables poolside. Everything was clean and the hotel maids were prompt to our needs and helpful with suggestions about restaurants around the city. This was a chance pick from the internet when I was doing my hotel search for our vacation, and we will be back again next year and when we pull into the parking lot, I wil say without a doubt, "Honey we're home". Thank you to all the wonderful staff at this hotel for making my vacation so memorable..... A Very Satisfied and Happy Guest L. Murphy-Room 507

Reviews.Title: “fantastic”
Reviews.Author: ichef
Reviews.Content: The staff there just great, the rooms clean, the grounds perfect, everyone with smiles on there faces, we are in Daytona twice a year and I dont think we will be staying anywhere else . Thank You Christine and Safaa for a wonderful 37th wedding anniversary WE WILL BE BACK and we will bring friends ........

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Marsha H
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an oceanfront efficiency on Saturday Sept 24,2011 until Tuesday Sept 27, 2011. Our room was clean and our view was fabulous! I always check the bathroom the moment we walk into a hotel~this bathroom was very clean! Our room was directly across the hall from the laundry! The pool area was wonderful and access to the beach was perfect. All desk staff were friendly and helpful. The cafe was great! I would recommend this hotel and I will stay there again on future visits to Daytona Beach!!

Reviews.Title: “How Good is VERY Good”
Reviews.Author: KenSolihull_England
Reviews.Content: We fly from England to Florida each year to visit our son and partner who live in Orlando. We just want to get out to the beach; my son and partner come visit us whilst we are at the beach. Tropical Winds fitted the bill perfectly with a large efficiency that could bed 6 people. As we had people coming and going it was very convenient. The Manager even suggested that we move to a cheaper room when there were only 2 or three of us, but we were so satisfied with our room. It was clean and fairly well equipped. When we asked for a larger fridge it arrived in minutes. The beach and views are spectacular as is the service in the hotel. The staff WANT to help and do. I have read a couple of poor reviews for August... these don't seem to be the same place we stayed. We liked it so much we stayed nearly three weeks and will book again for next year. Well done Christine (Manager), Gwynn (on front desk) and all the other for making our holiday such a success. See you next yeat

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, clean and quiet!”
Reviews.Author: Gwen17Dayton
Reviews.Content: I arrived on Sunday night around 11pm. There was a problem with my credit card. The guest agent was extremely nice and patient in allowing me to correct the problem. All of the staff and the manager was extremely friendly. Although I didn't eat in the restaurant, I did hear from other guests that the food was great. Definitely priced right. The air conditioning unit was a little loud but not to the point of distraction. THE VIEW AND LOCATION WAS UNBEATABLE...front row seats to experience the morning sunrise and evening sun set (AWESOME). I have already book another stay!!! Thanks to everyone! Gwen B

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal ... Great Place !!”
Reviews.Author: rrtwkm
Reviews.Content: Our first time at this nice Hotel. This trip was a real "beach trip" for my wife and I. We weren't looking for resort amenities ... we went for Sun and Ocean. This place was perfect ! The people were helpful and friendly, our room was above expectations, pool was great, hi-speed internet was excellent. On Sunday, we even had lunch at the Pool ... Hot Dogs for $1.00 each !! And a very cool guy serving them up who came and sat with us for a bit and had some funny stories ! Can't think of anything that was wrong here. We will definitely be back !!

Reviews.Title: “Was not happy.”
Reviews.Author: coolbreezejohns
Reviews.Content: We went Aug 9 2011 Monday morning, when we showed up the room was very dirty . The blankets had stains , the carpet was not vacuum, there was a dead moth on the floor,flys on the sliding door. We told the lady at the desk she gave us another room.This room was just as dirty, the blankets had black stains,the carpet was not vacuum, dust every where. We went back to the desk the lady gave us ANOTHER ROOM ..this room was no different just as dirty I said this is enough, We went back to the desk and I said I want the manger to come with me to see the room so she could see for herself just how BAD the rooms look and smell. I showed her the really bad stains on the blankets , the dirt on the floor, the dust everywhere... I said this is the 3rd room that I have looked at and all 3 roooms are dirty. I want my money back. She did not give me any problems returning my money . the only good I can say about the manger at Tropical Winds is she return my money.. I was very sad with the up keep of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: 4debbiedoo
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at Tropical Winds for 5 days and could not have asked for a better place to stay. The staff was extremely nice. We were allowed to check in early as the room was ready. This was the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed at. Staff is working around the clock making sure the hallways, elevators, pool area, etc were clean. Lydia cleaned our room and did a fabulous job. The front desk staff was helpful with directions and restaurants. Our efficiency had a nice kitchen area and was equipped with everything we needed. I have no doubt that we will visit Tropical Winds again! Great place for the value!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: rjarnold
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay here. It's not the Ritz, but it's clean and very comfortable. We were traveling with family so we had two rooms consisting of one king bed and pull out hide a bed. There was also a small frig & microwave. It was right on the beach and we had a great view of it from our balcony. The staff was very friendly and guided us to an excellent restaurant- the Charlie Horse at 810 South Atlantic. Excellent restaurant and their daily lunch specials are cheap-$5.99 including a drink! The hotel was also a great deal at about $75-80 a night for each room. What a bargain!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, ocean front, AC worked, perfectly satisfied”
Reviews.Author: AmsTravel23
Reviews.Content: Hotel was on the "quieter" part of Daytona Beach (north of the boardwalk), right where we wanted to be, but easy driving distance to everything. Hubby and I booked an oceanfront efficiency, so had a little kitchen included. Nice way to start off the morning eating breakfast on the balcony, finishing off the evening with a glass of wine from the local winery (wines of daytona - you have to try their "category 5" it changes flavors with every sip, my new favorite!) and some chocolate from Angell & Phelps (their raspberry truffles are AMAZING!!). In the kitchen was a little coffee maker, small stove/oven, full size fridge, microwave and enough basics (pots/silverware/dishes/starter sized dish soap/tea towels) to make a few meals for the three day weekend. Hotel has an outdoor pool and an indoor pool, neither was overly crowded while we were there for NASAs last shuttle launch, though I could see the pool areas feeling very crowded if you had more than 30 people at either. Room was clean - bathroom was clean - pillows were comfortable, mattresses fine, A/C worked well (just noisy enough to drown out the noise of the toddler next door who liked to spend late evenings and early mornings doing that little kid laugh/scream thing). Parking was never a problem (they give you a parking pass to put on your dash). Direct beach access from the outdoor pool area, can drive right onto the beach as well, tide permitting. Set up shop on the beach just steps away from the hotel, worked perfectly for us! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I've been to in all of my life.”
Reviews.Author: laura-jean1997
Reviews.Content: This hotel truely is the worst hotel I've been to in all of my life. Myself and three family members ended up booking a room here first through Special T travel and then through Holiday host after a three day stay in disney world. Upon arriving at this hotel myself and my family were all very tired from a long day at Disney world and then the drive up to Daytona Beach. I belive the pictures on the hotels website is very misleading. As we walked into the hotel, the lobby was very small, poorly lit, and just plain dirty. After checking in, we proceeded to our room, but upon opening the door we were taken aback by the TERRIBLE smell coming from the room. It smelled like something had died in it orw as rotten, either way it was UNBERABLE. Our room had two " Queen size beds" but were actually big enough to sleep one person. The sheets on the bed were once white, i suppose but were an ugly yellow color with dark and light spots on it, suggesting stains. Upon myself sitting on the bed, there was a huge stack of keys. This leads me to believe tht there was no maid service at all, and that maybe this hotel has "Hourly rates". The Carpet in the room was green and there were plenty of unidentified stains all over it, vairey in color. Everything in the room was greasy and dirty and disqusting. The envelope that was given to us with our roomkeys in it had hand written "Security Tips" on them written in magic marker. It said things like "Use deadbolt at all times, Dont open the door to any 'worker' with out them presenting an employe Id, Lock up all valueable items before leaving the room". This lead us to believe that they have had all these security problems before. Another issue was that we were promised an "Ocean front view" when actually the view we were given was a view of a parking lot. And then the bathroom was a completly other issue. The bathroom toliet was brownish looking and stopped up when we entered the room, and the bathtub itself was diseveled and DIRTY, there were bugs everywhere, and it smelled worse than anything you could imagine. This motel was SO BAD that my family and I came up with a rap " Im a Ganster, Im a straight up G, this ganster hotel aint the one for me". Its safe to say that we will never return to this hotel for the rest of our lives. It should be dimolished. After about half an hour in the room, we prompty left and rented a room elsewhere. P.S. This was our upgrade after a 90 minute presenation pressuring us into buying things...

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: CattJ55
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I didn't let the negative posts on here affect my decision to stay at this very nice hotel. It's not super big and fancy but reasonably priced, clean, friendly people and an awesome ocean view. We loved sitting on the balcony at night. The cafe was an added bonus and the food (as well as the staff) was great! I would recommend this hotel and hope to return.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: trainstar5
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just came back from our vacation stay at Tropical Winds Hotel. It was a very good hotel for the money. Right on the hotel strip, close to many restaurants and malls. Right on the beach, we were upgraded to oceanfront, just beautiful views. Rooms and beds are comfortable, quiet and clean. Very good maid service, front desk people are pleasant. Pool was clean, cafe in hotel pretty good for smacks. Refrigerator and microwave, plus coffee maker in room bonuses. Nice balcony as well. Parking was easy, if you want to make the most of your stay, rent a car and have a GPS system with you. We would stay here again. For the money, you can't beat this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: Traveler35872
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for three nights. The room was just okay however the oceanfront location was fantastic. For a $10 upgrade fee we went from ocean view to ocean front. We had a fridge and microwave which was good. We never ate in the hotel as the dining room was not too inviting. Had a great rate of $85/night including the upgrade. The staff members were not overly friendly especially the maid who when asked if we could borrow some Windex to clean our balcony window, came in with a snarl and attitude face which was not appreciated as we volunteered to do it ourselves. Needless to say her tip was a polite thank you. Probably would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Getaway”
Reviews.Author: tiffanybrown74
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Tropical Winds Hotel for about 3days 2nights it was fabulous. The staff was helpful and courteous. We plan to make this a yearly trip. Excellent view of the beach. The hotel is convient to all the social spots in Daytona. I actually wanted to relocate to Daytona after this trip.

Reviews.Title: “Happy Anniversary”
Reviews.Author: rodneyj1220
Reviews.Content: We came to the Tropical winds to celebrate our honeymoon. We had a nice room with a private balcony and great view. I came to the beach to for some quite beach time and that is what we had. We came early and hung out by the pool until our room was ready. They have cafe for breakfast and lunch fair price and good food. Every thing was clean and I had a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, excellent views”
Reviews.Author: 307x
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location, excellent outdoor pool and oceanfront deck. The indoor pool was lacking, but over the course of a week we only saw it used once by anybody - simply too beautiful outside to bother. Located close to grocery store and strip mall, but would take a bit of a trek to get to more touristy attractions along Atlantic Ave. 15 minute drive into inner Daytona. Staff was very nice to us, Ms Gwen at the front desk was especially memorable. Rooms were nicely sized with a range, microwave and full fridge. Oceanfront rooms provide amazing views and the balconies were a bit dingy but still great to hang out on. We paid around $100 a night each for two rooms, which I found to be an excellent rate.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Natalyandfamily
Reviews.Content: The room had a view of the ocean so it was very relaxing. Overall we liked it but even if we had a kitchenette it was missing a few items that would have made our lunch much easier... The hotel in general is very clean but our bathtub was in need of a change... The staff is very friendly. The outdoor pool was nice but we didn't use the indoor pool cause it was too hot to stay inside when we were there so we went to the beach instead.

Reviews.Title: “Five Star Getaway!!!”
Reviews.Author: coolcolors32
Reviews.Content: I just got home from vacation in Daytona. This hotel is a 5 star. I stayed here from April 17th through April 22nd,2011. I was on the 6th floor with a die hard view. Wow it was breathtaking. The 1st shift receptionist named Gwenn is fabulous. She is patient and very attentive to your needs and very friendly. Every time we passed by her she would make sure she said good morning or good afternoon. She's great!!! The hotel smelled clean and fresh at all times from your room till you reach the lobby. The cafeteria was awesome with decent prices for a full breakfast $5.75. The cafe workers exceptionally friendly treated you like you belong. Both pools were very clean and fun. The beach breathtaking and so clean. A place for anyone to go too and have homemade ice cream is Cow Licks wow so good and easy to get too. You start going south and will run right into it on your right side. All restaurants were right there and you could choose from so many. We have never gone there before but if I return I will stay right in this hotel. It is kept up from the outside to the inside. The rooms are so clean and a bed that swallows you that's how comfortable it is with extra pillows (relaxing). Everytime I was going to the beach or outside there was always cleaning going on. It was so refreshing to go to a hotel where you felt comfortable and got treated so well. The only problem I had was when I checked out Gwenn was not there yet and the red hair receptionist was there and she didn't even smile looked at me like I owed her something, I asked her a question and when she answered I said thank you and no response. Other than that everything was great. This hotel is a must......A Must see is the Light House not to far from hotel & Old Jail house and Alligator farm in Saint Augustine!

Reviews.Title: “Very Cozy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jj5627
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Hotel from 4/10-4/13 and was very happpy the Hotel staff were incredible they were very knowagable and friendly. rooms were comfy and clean. the pool also was clean and the patio area easy acess to the Beach. Great location to the boardwalk and close to transprtation and other attractions.I will be staying hear again if im in the Daytona Area. This is a good hotel to stay at.

Reviews.Title: “For the price --- WOW!”
Reviews.Author: jhughey
Reviews.Content: Clean rooms, wonderful service, comfy beds and a balcony right on the ocean. Who could ask for more for just $100 a night??? We love this place and will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: Georgia30252
Reviews.Content: Great hotel and location. After spending 4 days in Orlando in an awful hotel this was much needed retreat to end our vacation. The staff was friendly and very helpful. Getting clean towels and having our room cleaned was not an additional cost like the hotel in Orlando. We had and ocean front room with a balcony so we were able to enjoy the ocean from the privacy of our room. This was the best part of the trip! Our room had a full size refrigerator, stove and microwave. There were also washer and dryers available at an additional cost. Resturants and shopping with walking distance. I highly recommend and plan to return again myself.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS TRIP - ECONOMICAL BUT WONDERFUL”
Reviews.Author: friendlyflyer84
Reviews.Content: At the last minute, we decided to go to Daytona Beach for spring break. I looked at Roomsaver.com for who had coupon rates for the Daytona area then I compared that to people's reviews on trip advisor. I appreciated the latest comments in regards to their stay. Hopefully my review will help you with your decision as well. We booked our reservation and began our stay in the oceanfront efficiency (2 double beds). We arrived on March 27th. We were greeted by Bryan at the front desk. He was very friendly. He got us checked in and even recommended the best pizza place I have ever had! (Giovanni's - New York Style Pizza at its best) Some of the previous reviews stated that the hotel smelled. We never had a problem with a foul odor in the hotel. It always smelled fresh. Our room (207) had two double beds, tv, apartment style refrigerator, microwave, sink, 4 burner stove, with oven. There were basic dishes and cooking pan. They provided dish washing soap, dish towel and dish cloth. There was an electric can opener and a toaster as well. The room was clean and nicely decorated. There were NO bed bugs or any type of bugs in the room as a matter of fact. I did see the Orkin man during our stay but if anyone knows Florida it is the place that doesn't have the bugman coming that are the ones that have the problems. There were extra pillows on each bed which was nice. I would refer to the mattresses as being like the ones at an economical hotel (days inn, red roof inn, etc) Standard bed coverings. The room had two chairs and a table. The balcony had two patio chairs and two patio end tables. We were able to use the patio chairs to sit around the table inside. Though my daughters liked the idea of eating in bed the best. There was internet access available though for some reason I could get it to work on my laptop and not on my phone. (wouldn't be surprised if that was operator error). I wouldn't call it high speed internet but it was functional for our needs. The girls used both the indoor and outdoor pools. They were both very clean. The indoor pool was much warmer than the outdoor pool. We did not use the restaurant because we had everything that we needed. It did seem popular and had decent prices for breakfast and lunch. Ham and Cheese omlet with potatoes, toast for $5.75. Hamburger and french fries at $4.00. The down side to this room was the bathroom. It was very small. The door to the bathroom would open into the bathroom so if you opened the door it would just about hit the toilet seat. Hard to have more than one person in the bathroom at one time. When you travel with 3 teenage girls (a total of 4 women) the bathroom is an important part of the room. Even though the bathroom was a negative. The view from the balcony was a positive. Breath taking!!! We kept the door to the balcony open as much as possible to be able to hear the ocean. I was able to sit out on the balcony in the morning while the girls were sleeping and watch the sunrise and listen to the sounds of the ocean. It was also nice to be able to keep an eye on them at the pool and/or on the beach while sitting on the balcony. Tropical Winds was approximately 1.5 miles (per my cardiotrainer) from the boardwalk. This was a nice distance to keep us out the crowds but close enough to the attractions. Definately a good walk up and back (less guilt when eating the homemade ice cream from boardwalk area). Two nights into our stay I asked to see the different types of rooms that were available in the hotel. I was given two keys, one to the city apartment and the other to the penthouse. Christine, the general manager, was very accommodating and very pleasant. CITY APARTMENT Though we didn't stay in this apartment I thought I would share information about it. It is a two room suite. One room has a queen size bed, dresser and tv. The other room is a general room with a king size bed, sleeper sofa, four person table, tv, and efficiency kitchen simiar to the one in the oceanfront efficiency. Same size bathroom as the oceanfront efficiency. The city apartment gives a view of the city and not the ocean, thus called the city apartment. THE PENTHOUSE After staying two nights in the oceanfront efficiency and looking at the penthouse we opted to upgrade (about $40/night more than what we were paying for the oceanfront efficiency). The penthouse was perfect for us. The penthouse included a bedroom with a kingsize bed (economical pillowtop but very comfortable), dresser, tv, closet, and window view of the ocean. It had an L shaped living and dining area with a queen size sleeper sofa, coffee table, two sofa chairs, 6 person glass dining table, and plazma screen television. The kitchen was a full size kitchen with a full size refrigerator, full size flat top stove and oven, above the range microwave. This unit had extensive cabinet space as well as more dishes and pots and pans than the efficiency. The balcony was twice the size of the efficiency balcony and had a double sliding glass door to the balcony. The penthouse by itself may be small for some families but with 4 girls it was perfect. The penthouse also has an adjoining door to an oceanfront 2 double bed efficiency that could be added for a larger family. We were in room 801 which was considered part of the coral suite. Room 801 had a standard key lock on it. The door to the coral suite had a key card access that allowed access to the hallway for rooms 801 and 811. 811 could be also added to the penthouse if you have a larger group or family. 811 had a kingsize bed and a sleeper sofa and was a city view room. Several recommendations that I would make in regards to staying here: If you opt to use your kitchen to cook in, I would recommend bringing your favorite non stick frying pan. The pans are ok but weren't nonstick surface. When you go to the grocery store, make sure to get papertowels and napkins., They don't have any in the hotel and you will want to have them. I was glad I took an extra blanket. I know they would have gotten one for me if I wanted it; it was just nice to have one from home. Bring laundry detergent and quarters. There are two washers and two dryers on the second level. Only $1.00 to wash and $1.00 to dry which I thought was a great deal because I didn't have to go very far, If you want suggestions for places to eat, visit, see.. ASK The staff here was wonderful. Every suggestion I got from them was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Looking for a GREAT hotel? Look no further…”
Reviews.Author: Geosqt
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at several hotels on the strip during bike week and for our money, this was one of the best hotels by far. We have yet to stay at the same place twice but Tropical Winds has since changed our minds about that. We don’t like to stay too close to Main Street due to all the noise and traffic so the location was perfect. We were still close enough to all of the action so we didn’t have to ride too far after a long day. Check in was a breeze and during bike week that can be a timely process. They didn’t have enough parking for all of the bikes and cars but that is a problem at most hotels on the strip. At least this one doesn’t charge per day for a parking fee, as many of them do. Our room was on the 8th floor and the view was spectacular. There is nothing like listening to the ocean while relaxing in your room. The room itself was clean and the decor was recently updated. The size was more than adequate for two adults and the beds were super comfortable. The mini kitchen worked out great for us. No more wasted leftovers. The housekeepers we’re all friendly and each was very accommodating. Thankfully they have laundry room as this is essential when you’re traveling on a motorcycle and have limited space for excess clothing. The poolside café had great food and the staff treated us like we were long lost friends. A couple of them were from Chicago, as we are but I suspect they are just as friendly to everyone they meet regardless of where they’re from. For being an older hotel, overall they do their best to maintain the property and the atmosphere is a very pleasant one. If you’re looking for a great deal this is it. I did a lot of research this time due to my own paranoia regarding bed bugs and I’m happy to report this was NOT an issue at this hotel. In fact I didn’t see one single bug. Fortunately I did all of that research because a few of our other hotel choices were suspected of having these nasty little creatures. That is what led us to Tropical Winds and we could not have been happier with our choice. My hubby does freelance writing for motorcycle magazines and he’ll be sure to let his readers know how accommodating and motorcycle-friendly your hotel - and staff are. Kudos to you, Tropical Winds! We’ll see ya next time!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, Great location”
Reviews.Author: JRS61
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for four nights, our first trip to Daytona Beach. Because it was school vacation and Race Week, the prices were escalated; as they were everywhere in the area. The building is older, but not as old as some others appeared on the "strip". It was clean, but not spotless. The stairwells and hallways smelled a bit musty. Someone was constantly painting the outside stucco walls surrounding the parking area and the walkways while we were there, so they do try and maintain it well. The room was small but acceptable, as we were only staying a short time. It had a small cooking area with a full size fridge, small stove and sink - all older, but in working order. The indoor pool was a very small area with alot of condensation from the pipes above. To sit by the side of the pool, water was dripping down constantly. The outdoor pool area was fine (would probably be very crowded in the summer months), but unfortunately, the pool was not heated so the water was even too cold for the kids (15 and 9) to go in. The view of the ocean and the beach area are beautiful, cars are allowed to drive on the beach directly in front of the hotel, not much traffic this time of year, but may be a deterrent in the summer months. The staff was phenomenol! By the second morning, the staff in the cafe already knew how I liked my coffee! They chatted and were all very helpful and friendly. Check in was very easy, and even arriving hours early, they were able to give us a room. Because this was a short trip, our stay was fine. I don't think I would like to stay here or in the area for much longer. It was very "touristy" with lots of cheap gift shops, with nice restaurants hard to find. Overall, it was very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “I will stay here every year during Bike Week!!!”
Reviews.Author: RocknRobin419
Reviews.Content: My friend and I came to Daytona Bike Week for the first time and did not have a clue where to stay. Tropical Winds was on the Official Bike Week list of hotels. We checked out the website, read reviews (which are not always accurate) and crossed our fingers. After a grueling 2 day trip down from Maryland (during a fluke nor'easter), we were extremely pleased with our stay at the Tropical Winds Hotel. The price was amazing for an oceanfront hotel during bike week. Staff was super friendly and catered to our every need. The rooms were spacious, clean and offered a fantastic ocean view and a wonderful ocean breeze. The hotel is also in a great spot... just north of W. International Speedway, and just south of Ormond Beach. If we could, we would have definitely extended our stay!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Vancamper
Reviews.Content: Our stay was quite comfortable. This is an older property with great views that is very well maintained. The staff was congenial. Breakfast in the restaurant was as enjoyable as being home with extended family or with a group of friends. Several guests were seniors from northern states who were taking an extended break from winter. There was even an activity schedule posted. We were there 6 nights and we were exploring the area so we never had lunch in the restaurant. Restaurant prices were reasonable. The beds were older, no memory foam or pillow top, but adequate. Our studio had a refrig, sink and stove.

Reviews.Title: “gracious”
Reviews.Author: miles40
Reviews.Content: My stay at this hotel was very good, the people and the workers were top notched. The front desk worker was at her best, My experience was more pleasent then lots of other hotels that I have been too. Also there was incident when a family that has been driving for over 13 hrs came with no reservations the worker at the front desk took the time and patients, to work with this family and let family check out the rooms and see if any of the rooms was to their liking and did not talk about costs until the family had seen the fhree different kinds of rooms to me in a world where kindness seem to be forgotten tropical winds workers and management never forgot this is a top knotch place in my book.

Reviews.Title: “Finally, a hotel we WANT to return to when visiting Daytona Beach!”
Reviews.Author: SusieColumbus
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several hotels - once - in the area over the years, but none have met with our expectations as Tropical Winds has. We will definitely return to this hotel for all of our visits to Daytona Beach. The rooms are very comfortable & clean. The staff is very helpful and friendly. The cleaning staff is also very friendly and efficient. The indoor pool is a wonderful place to relax for those chilly winter months. The views of the ocean from our room balcony were magnificent. The convenience of a laundry inside the hotel is priceless, especially when you consider that it was less expensive than most coin operated laundromats. It was a sincere pleasure to stay at a hotel so clean and well maintained! Thanks again for a wonderful stay!!! :D

Reviews.Title: “exquisite and peaceful”
Reviews.Author: mmgingras
Reviews.Content: little gem right on the oceanfront, very friendly and helpful staff, everyone has to meet miss gwen, she is a riot!!!!!! we have been coming to this location now for the past four years, getting better all the time , room adequate size with mini-kitchen to save you a little money occeanfront room with balcony. cannot beat the sunrise and sunsets, hotel a bit outdated but you cannot beat the price for the accommodations, inside heated pool does the trick on the occasional rainy days as well as restaurant on site. would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Hope you dont want to park your car during your stay!”
Reviews.Author: floridawaxer
Reviews.Content: Rooms are big and clean. Hotel is fairly close to the boardwalk (about 1 mile away). NO PARKING. They dont have very much parking, we come back from a late night the hotel receptionist told us SHE WILL TOW us if we didnt park in the spot she told us to. That spot you might ask? BLOCKING 2 1/2 handicapped spots. Then on top of it, none of the staff was nice. I will not return and do not recommend. I can only see this as being a good hotel on a dead night during the week with no where else to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nicer looking compared to it's neighbors”
Reviews.Author: newjorker
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay in Daytona Beach and reviews and photos can only help you so much. This hotel has very reasonable prices and the room that we stayed in ( room had a huge king size bed and one pullout couch, a balcony that had partial views of the ocean and partial views of the street because it was on the side of the building). Our room had a microwave and a small fridge (enough to fit food for a couple of days). The one thing I can say that isn't amazing is the housekeeping. My boyfriend and I were there for 5 days, 4 nights and at least two of the days that we were there, our bed was never made. The room however always felt clean despite housekeeping not entering our room. The hallways of the hotel where the rooms are resemble an old apartment building but it smells clean. I recommend having a car if you're going to stay here because everything (restaurants, supermarkets, waterpark, liquor stores) are all within driving distance. This hotel has a clean pool with many chairs around to just sit or tan :) There are also stairs that lead down to the beach and you can go on the beach at any hour you wish! We only intended to stay for 3 nights but on the 3rd or 4th day that we were there, we told the nice woman at the front desk that we wanted to stay another night and she was fine with it. If you're looking for something romantic to do without leaving the hotel, get a bottle of wine and sit on your balcony with your significant other and listen to the ocean. I would certainly stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Oceanfront Pleasure”
Reviews.Author: jersegal
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights as part of a timeshare sales pitch package. Didn't buy the timeshare but t certainly enjoyed my stay here. Clean and bright freshly painted hall walls welcome you. The balcony was the perfect place to relax to the sound of the waves. A full sized refrigerator and stove, basic kitchenware, a spotless bathroom, newer bedding and furniture and carpeting. The front desk staff were pleasant and helpful. I had a delightful breakfast in the attached cafe. What more could you ask for? The highlight of the stay was walking the beach at sunrise at the same pace as a pod of dolphin.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: kkesler
Reviews.Content: You know I was worried after reading some reviews. But I stayed here and down at the Hilton by the boardwalk and honestly this was a far better value for what ya get. Not an overtly busy beach area with great amenities. Staff was nice and room was clean. Payed a 10 bonus for the beach view and it was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: “I would certainly recommend Tropical Winds”
Reviews.Author: DaytonaB
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Tropical Winds Hotel in Daytona Beach from September 22/10 to October 01/10. We had an Oceanfront Room with a spectacular view. What you see on the website is exactly as it is. Not like some websites that make their hotel look better than it really is. The onsite Cafe offers Breakfast and Lunch and the prices are very low. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The outdoor pool was very clean and well looked after and the chaise lounges very comfortable. There was also an indoor pool which was very nice as well. The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful. Parking was free and the hotel offered guests free WiFi as well. For guests who did not have their own computer, there is a computer just off the lobby for hotel guests to use as well as a small library. On our next visit to Daytona Beach, we will be staying at the Tropical Winds again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Bailed Us Out”
Reviews.Author: Faithfuladvisor
Reviews.Content: Thanks to the Tropical Winds, after booking a stay at another nearby hotel which was extremely horrible experience, Tropical Winds found us a very clean and comfortable room and was able to check in at 10:30 AM. Cant say a bad word about the place. The breakfast they serve was #1. Beds comfortable and not outdated. No charge for parking either. Everything was exceptionally clean !! Nice staff. We will be back anytime we visit Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Another Top Notch Experience!”
Reviews.Author: baldeagle87
Reviews.Content: Just returned from spending Labor Day weekend at Tropical Winds Hotel in Daytona Beach and can’t wait to share my experience with other travellers. This was my second stay at this quaint oceanfront hotel and it was even better than the 1st time. The staff at this hotel is so accommodating and friendly and entertaining - you cannot beat the view from the oceanfront balcony. They even remembered me from my first stay a few months ago. From the moment you walk in the door you feel like you are among family - everything is spotless - our room was an oceanfront with full kitchen oceanfront on the top floor and was just perfect for us with everything we could possibly need including free coffee. Our housekeeper did an excellent job cleaning and the room was beautifully decorated and so comfortable - everything was shiny and smelled so fresh. Saturday and Sunday on the pool deck at lunchtime we were able to get $1.00 hot dogs and $2.00 Barbeque sandwiches - what a deal - they were served by the older gentleman who runs the café - what a blast he is - he had adults and children in stitches. Since we had a bit of rain the indoor pool came in very handy and both pools were sparkling clean even with the large crowds on the weekend. Everything was in excellent working order from the elevators to the free wireless internet, the air conditioning, television . This is the only place I will ever stay at in Daytona Beach and I overheard a lot of other guests saying the same thing. In summary - the manager and staff of this hotel take pride in their workplace and go out of their way to make you feel at home!! I already made reservation to return next month

Reviews.Title: “Wish I could recommend this, but can't”
Reviews.Author: LIM76
Reviews.Content: Like many other reviewers, our room had a terrible odor. We stayed in September 2010. It was only tolerable when the ocean front balcony was open and fresh air was coming in. We were on the 7th floor. If you stay there, make sure you visit the room BEFORE you check in. If it stinks, insist on another room, or check out. It's awful. We stayed because with the balcony door open, it was tolerable. The service - desk clerk, cafe (cook and waiter), and cleaning crew were very nice. The food is great. The location and views are great. High speed internet was fast. With all the good things going for it, I would never go back and can't recommend it. The stench was awful. We had to clean everthing, including our suitcases when we got back. For the stake of the excellent staff, I wish I could recommend it, but cannot.

Reviews.Title: “surprised”
Reviews.Author: hickeybaby
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel with an open mind after reading the reviews from others. when i got there the staff was very friendly and the room was more than i reserved. we had a kitchenette and an absolute beautiful view of the ocean. the room was clean and house keeping was prompt to restock everyday. if there is one thing that i could say that would be a negative it would be that it might need to be updated with some modern decor. i will definitely be staying there again. it was close to many amenities. great for families!

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: JSTL
Reviews.Content: It was our first family vacation in Daytona beach at the Tropical Winds Hotel. It was perfect! The rooms were very clean and the staff was number one! Always nice with a smile and always ready to help us. We`ve staid there for 10 days. 5 days in an oceanfront room witch was very nice to see the dolphins in the morning and at the end of the day from our balcony than we took a 2 rooms apt. wich was easyer with two small kids. The pool was clean and nice. Enough chairs for everyone and two step from the beach wich was not to crowldly perfect for family. Close to the supermarket, restaurant and stores. The hotel was quiet so perfect for us with a 4 year old and a 15 months kids. The restaurant at the hotel was very good and not expensive and you all need to try there chili dog! very very good! Thanks a lot to all the staff at the Tropical Winds and we are looking foward to see you all next year for a 14 days vacations this time, 10 days was not anough so see you all next year! We recommend this hotel to all families from Quebec city! Jeff et Julie

Reviews.Title: “Awsome stay i loved it!”
Reviews.Author: mcandkh10
Reviews.Content: This hotel is so clean and nice we all loved the stay :) i had so much fun. its a hotel your arent scared to take your shoes off at. The veiw was beautifull they have an indoor and outdoor pool which is nice. If i came back to daytona i would stay at that hotel it was afforable the lady at the front desk was so nice easy to start a conversation with. Id would deff. come back thanks for a great stay :) i highy recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “For those who have never been in a real 5-stars”
Reviews.Author: StLow
Reviews.Content: Cleanliness: It was effectively spotless like many other reviews said. However, nobody wrote about the special odor it smells in this hotel. Maybe this is due to the food poeple are cooking, but personaly it was very unpleasant. I would say the same thing about the carpet in the room: maybe it's clean, but when you feel the humidity under the feet, you do not want to know what is hidden there... Location: 1-2 miles north of boardwalk. Quiet area. Perfect for the beach. We walk on the street in the evening. The street was dark. I cannot say I was feeling very safe with my family... Rooms: oceanfront with Kitchenette with balcony. GREAT VIEW!!! Great Tv channel choice (and the remote was very well working!!!) even if the TV plastic casing was broken... Fridge was perfect. Oven perfect too. Bathroom was a bit small for 4 persons. Excellent and Free WI-FI service. Matress was not very comfortable. Service: didn't have to ask special request, but one of the person at the desk was not very smiling, especially at check-out. She didn't ask any feedback about the stay... Value: Old building well kept. The owners fairly do their best to keep this hotel top notch but people "living" there are not necessarily helping. Two examples of the most disgusting thing I've seen in my 2-days stay: 1) Woman spiting from the 7th floor just over the pool area 2) Smokers on lounge chair around the pool taking the ground for an ashtray A little 101 course for those who are not used to live in society: a pool patio in not an ashtray: an ashtray is an ashtray. USE IT! It was very disgusting to see those cigarettes on the floor around the pool. Do those persons are doing that at home??? For those spiting from upper flor, I don't think I need to say something... Overall: very good price. With the quality you have when you pay less. However, when it's cheap, there is more chance to attract people like I described above... So, for those who have never been in a real 5-stars, please note that this hotel is far from a 5-stars. It's a 3-stars max.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, Great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Heather2447
Reviews.Content: Tropical Winds is a great little oceanfront hotel with a wonderful staff. The room my family stayed in had a perfect oceanfront view and was very clean. The room was a little smaller than I expected from the photos, but the great location, view, and super-friendly staff more than made up for it! The hotel boasts 2 pools - one indoor and one outdoor. I was initially surprised that the indoor pool was not heated, but the hot temperatures in Daytona really made it unnecessary. The hotel provides towels for guests at the pool, and has plenty of nice seating surrounding the outdoor one. I never felt that it was too crowded to go to the pool deck. The poolside cafe is great. My family waited until the last morning of our vacation to try the cafe, and I wish we wouldn't have waited! It was by far the least expensive meal we ate at Daytona, and the quality was right on par with the more expensive breakfast restaurants near the hotel. Last, but not least, the best thing about the Tropical Winds Hotel is the staff. They were EXTREMELY friendly and really went out of their way to make sure my family had a great vacation. There was not one instance when we walked through the doors that we were not spoken to and met with a smile. Service like we received is hard to come by, and made our stay truly enjoyable. I would not hesitate for a minute to recommend the Tropical Winds to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: nancyg56
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying at this lovely little hotel when I attended the Coke Zero 400 with my husband. I was not really expecting too much but was pleasantly surprised when we arrived. The lady at the front desk was friendly and made us feel like guests rather than customers as she checked us in. We were told our room was ready and gave us directions to the elevator. The room was clean and cool, the bed already turned down for us. We had a great view of the ocean, in this hotel ocean front means ocean front. There is a little poolside cafe that offered simple food that was reasonably priced for tasty substancial portions but honestly the staff was reason enough to visit. I am an early riser and was offered coffee even though the little restaurant had not opened. The staff in this hotel is visable adn friendly, stopping to greet us as we walked through the hotel. The pool area was clean and was well stocked with plenty of towels. There were enough lounge chairs for everyone as well as poolside tables and chairs. Even here there were staff members tending the area and greeting us. We like plenty of towels and our housekeeper made sure that we had more than enough each day. We would be happy to visit this lovely hotel again. It may not have been a 5 star hotel in a travel book but the staff and guests could have been fooled!

Reviews.Title: “if you are looking for a 5 star resort........”
Reviews.Author: FORGATOR
Reviews.Content: trust me, there is not one in the Daytona Beach area. Go to Disney World and pay $300 or more a night. On the other hand if you are looking for a relaxing stay in Daytona with spotless rooms, comfortable beds, a fantastic view of the ocean, a beautiful pool, the area's friendliest staff at a more than fair price, the Tropical winds is for you. Manager Christine and her staff set the bar on how a beach resort should be run. If Gwen at the front desk does not put a smile on your face, you have a personality problem. Not to mention the neatest little pool side cafe that serves breakfast and lunch. I have stayed at The TW many times and am already counting the days to my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: fluffygreenwood_in
Reviews.Content: This is our home away from home in Florida. My wife & I have been coming here for five years, all the employes are very helpful to us. We are thankful that the hotel is here. We have recommendedto our family and friends to come here for their vacations.We have a maid on the six th floor who is excellent in cleaning our room.
