The hotel is spotless and all the employees always have a smile on their face. Ms. Gwen is a such a pleasure to deal with and we feel like we are part of the family here. Every time we come , which is 3 times a year we can see that the owner has put money into the place to upgrade. Everything is in great working condition and if there ever is a problem the housekeeping and maintenance staff are right there to correct it. Ther is no other place in Daytona I would ever stay at. The management and owners of Tropical Winds need to be commended for doing such a good job.

Reviews.Title: “Very good Hotel for the money”
Reviews.Author: alfaromeoKent
Reviews.Content: We flew into Orlando Airport but it took 2 hours to get through immigration which then made us late to pick up our hire car, we then had 70 miles to drive to Daytona. We had booked a sunset room at the Tropical Winds Oceanfront Hotel, but got there too late so asked if we could change our room to a 'sunrise room' and as usual in the US 'No Problem' we saw the most beautiful sunrise and we had a small balcony so we could stand out there first thing in the morning and watch the sunrise. It was as it says right on the beach and it made our day when we saw a flock of pelicans fly by and perch on someone's balcony. Very good cooked breakfast, very reasonably and the hotel was very good and reasonably priced for around $70.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, friendly hotel for a family vacation.”
Reviews.Author: jan1224
Reviews.Content: Our family of 5 adults and one child spent 4 days at the Tropical Winds and thoroughly enjoyed it! Rooms were spacious and very clean. It was so nice having kitchen facilities. We had to change rooms for 3rd and 4th nights' stay due to unavailability of the suite we had the first two nights. The staff was very accommodating about letting us move first thing in the morning rather than wait until normal check-in time. The location is excellent, fairly quiet and the beach was great. Each employee we encountered during our stay was very pleasant; as we left on Mother's Day, each one wished my daughter and I a Happy Mother's Day. I look forward to a return visit and would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The pictures on the Website are misleading for this hotel, don't book.”
Reviews.Author: Macner
Reviews.Content: I just returned from staying a week at this hotel during sprink break with my sister and neice. We had a one room with an ocean view at first and this was probably the worst room in the hotel and I immediately upgraded to an ocean front room, which did have a nice view but the room was not very nice. I have traveled a lot and usely stay at RCI affiliated resorts so this was my first hotel vacation in a long time and I was really disappointed in this hotel. I should have know this hotel was not really nice when I walked into the lobby because there was nothing nice about it. The rooms are old and run down and they only have one elevator for service and guests. I did feel like the hotel was clean but would never stay at this hotel again. There are a lot of nice hotels on Daytona and I would recommending book one of those and paying a little more money because you will be happier in the long run.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: saders1331
Reviews.Content: We found this place driving by. From the momement we walked in we were greeted by a friendly helpful staff. Absolutly clean, clean, clean, room ! The owner of this hotel should be proud of the employees. The poolside cafe has great breakfasts at such cheap prices. We went there every morning. Easy parking , easy access to the beach. We would recommend this place to anyone and everyone.

Reviews.Title: “very friendly ( gwen)”
Reviews.Author: painting4fun
Reviews.Content: Came down to tropical winds on Franklin Bus Tour great place to stay . Will be back next year by bus or car. Very friendly and keep things clean. See you next year Gwen.From room 205.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: budda333
Reviews.Content: We think Tropical Winds is a great place to stay. We have been going there for 5 years. The staff does a great job. The pool side cafe is a nice relaxing place to eat & the price is right.Franz & Billie are a lot of fun.The hotel is clean .Every thing is handy.The lounge isa nice place to visit at night. We had lots of fun there.A vey friendly hotel. I am going back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the location - great staff, always cleaning and updating”
Reviews.Author: ricecakes87
Reviews.Content: The entire staff was friendly as well as most of the guests you encounter. This time of year, many people are staying for a month or more. Their building mntc man was shampooing carpets, touching up paint or mopping the lobby floor every time we saw him. Great location for the more quiet end of the beach, plenty of parking. Cafe serves breakfast and lunch at great prices. $4 for cheeseburger and fries. We had planned to buy groceries and cook in our room but at those prices, we didn't bother. Did our laundry before leaving, they had nice washers and dryers for $1 each; better than you find at most hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home”
Reviews.Author: WinnieGermany
Reviews.Content: We come from Germany to this hotel, this year for the 5th time. We stay between 4-7 weeks in December/January. The hotel is directly on the beautiful beach. It has a pooldeck with lots of comfortable chairs and a heated indoor pool. The rooms have nice furniture and a kitchen. They are very clean and so is the entire hotel. We feel very comfortable here. They also have a Poolside Cafe, where you can eat breakfast and lunch for a very good prize. The hotel is located near a lot of restaurants and shops and the airport. We meet the same (winter)guests every year. Everybody loves to come back here. The hotel manager is german and also one desk clerk. They help us with any questions. We recommend the Tropical Winds very much and can't wait to come again next year! (Hotelpersonal spricht deutsch! Perfekt fuer deutsche Urlauber!)

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: chev7
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last year and again this year,we had a king room with ocean veiw no complants . We love this hotel small and cozy will be back again in Dec.

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Fun”
Reviews.Author: BassTracker7
Reviews.Content: Just returned from Daytona Beach. My friend and I spent one week at Tropical Winds Hotel. We booked online after searching for some time and chose this one because of the great reviews it had received. From the moment we stepped in the door and were greeted with a big smile. We knew we had made the right choice. Our oceanfront room was delightful – had a small kitchen equipped with everything we needed – the private balcony had 2 comfortable chairs and the best view of the ocean. Our room was spotless and our housekeeper was accommodating and always smiling. Both pools were sparkling clean and the outdoor deck has beautiful very comfortable lounges – not the old standard hard plastic ones. They had a great poolside café with great food and prices. We already booked our next vacation before we left – keep up the good work and thanks for making this a very special vacation for us!

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Daytona Beach!”
Reviews.Author: scooby22you
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th year staying at Tropical Winds in Daytona Beach and our experience gets better each year. The place is immaculate – from the beautiful landscaping, the pool deck, the reception desk to the oceanfront rooms – everything is so clean and smells so clean. No musty odors, that are often associated with beachfront hotels. The housekeeping staff does a wonderful job and they are so friendly even the ones that speak very little English. All the employees are always busy straightening up, sweeping, cleaning windows – they seem very motivated to excel in their jobs. From year to year we see more improvements – this is an owner who apparently puts money back into his hotel unlike a lot of hotel owners nowadays. This time we had a room with a 37 inch flat screen TV on the wall – don’t see that much in a small independent beachfront hotel. The view of our balcony on the 7th floor was breathtaking – we saw dolphins almost every morning and even saw a rocket launch from the Kennedy Space Center this time. You do not want to miss having breakfast at the quaint little café overlooking the pool and ocean. What a riot the operator is – and the food is so delicious and so reasonable. Everyone we have ever encountered at this hotel from all the employees to other guests who seem to come back again and again, some of them stay a month or more every year, also have just been so gracious. Thank you Tropical Winds Management and Staff for another fabulous and unforgettable vacation!!

Reviews.Title: “WOW, what a GEM”
Reviews.Author: baldeagle87
Reviews.Content: Wow!!!! I found Tropical Winds Hotel just driving down A1A-what a gem of a hotel. Just spent 10 days of the most relaxing ever vacation there. Cleanest rooms I have ever stayed in Daytona Beach and what a great staff, from the front desk to housekeeping and maintenance-everyone always had a smile on their face and seemd genuinely concerned with every guests well being. The folks who run the poolside cafe are a delight-they start out your day with great food and service as well as great comedy. The rooms are nicely decorated, have full kitchenettes and the view of the ocean is fabulous. In this day and age it is a pleasure to find a place where the employees seem to actually love their jobs-I am glad I found a home away from home at Tropical Winds. Kudos to the owners and management of this hotel. I will be back soon!!

Reviews.Title: “It's the only place to stay in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Luluip
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd time staying at this hotel. Why look for anything else, when you know what you have, when you stay here. It's like Home away from Home. Very clean, close to shops, restaurants, niteclubs etc... Located right on the beach. Super friendly staff. I can't say enough about this hotel. Keep up the "Great Job" staff at the Tropical Winds. Hope to see you all soon....

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Good Location, Good Rooms, Great For The Price”
Reviews.Author: bondjamesbondpr
Reviews.Content: I stayed here from September 26-27, 2009, just 1 night. I booked an oceanfront room by phone ,.. the reservation was quick, easy and they even set me up for a higher room. Amazing oceanfront view, king bed + sofa for just under $90 w/ tax included. Can't be that!!! Also the hotel had a pretty good location ... you could see the pier from the hotel and just a very short drive to Ocean Walk Village or Boardwalk. The outside pool was excellent with more than adequate chair lounges. I recommend this hotel hands on without hesitation. Nevertheless you have to understand this is a smaller hotel lacking all the glamour of a bigger resort ... so if you're looking for luxury and spectacular lobbys this is not the hotel for you. I would stay here again in the oceanfront king room without hesitation!

Reviews.Title: “This place is great!”
Reviews.Author: FLMaryS
Reviews.Content: I have only good things to say about this place. Great price, very clean, everything worked and looked great, nice furniture and decorations, friendly staff, fantastic view (in ocean front room). Was quiet at all times. You know how some places you can hear everyone's door slamming? None of that here. Easy check in/check out. Has a cute cafe on site that serves breakfast & lunch really cheap. High speed internet worked great. Has 2 pools, one inside and one outside. Around the outside pool are canvas deck chairs, not the old hard plastic kind like most places have. They provide pool-side towels also. We definitely plan on staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good View of the Ocean”
Reviews.Author: smithpatty57
Reviews.Content: I had a decent trip, the room was clean also spacious and the staff was nice. The best part about it was the view of the Ocean. I would stay again

Reviews.Title: “Tropical Winds is A-OK!”
Reviews.Author: Cheschirecat
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Tropical Winds Oceanfront Hotel from 08/14 until 08/18 I booked a oceanfront double bed room for 77 dollars a night which was amazing. I had read the reviews on Trip Advisor and requested a no smoking, high room. We received just that. FYI: OCEANVIEW IS NOT OCEANFRONT. The room was equipped with a small kitchen that had basic utensils, pots and pans and a coffee maker, two double beds, a balcony with an amazing OCEANFRONT view. This hotel is old like most hotels in DB, but the staff was nice and friendly and for 77 dollars a night we were satisfied. It is located in a quieter part of the beach. You just walked out the back of the hotel, past the pool and then down the steps and you are on the beach. I did not use the indoor pool it looked old. We did use the outdoor pool and it was a green color. I asked and was told it was a fresh water pool, but it was ok. We swam in it and had a great time. The restaurant is little, but the food was good and we enjoyed it. We will stay again! Places to eat: Bertie's Luncheonette is located where the Publix store is It is in the corner. EXCELLENT pancakes. THEY ARE HUGE. Alfie's Restaurant in Ormand By the Sea just a few miles on A1A My husband got a HUGE seafood platter for 16.95 We both took our food back to the hotel. Try the fried ice cream we couldn't , but saw it and it looked like it could feed 4 people.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT for the family!”
Reviews.Author: churchspaint_2002
Reviews.Content: I was very apprehensive when booking a hotel online. I did tons of research and finally settled on Tropical Winds. This was my family's first vacation so I wanted it to be memorable. I couldn't have asked for more. This hotel was a pleasant surprise. The view was AWESOME, even the dolphins:) It was a hop, skip, and a jump from the ocean. I liked the fact that this hotel was in a more quiet area of Daytona which made it feel more family oriented. There was some noise, but nothing more than a typical stay at a hotel. Thanks Tropical Winds for a remarkable stay and we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “UK VISITORS: NOT TO BAD AT ALL.”
Reviews.Author: raymondvips
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed or eight night in June/July 09. We had an ocean front amenity (bedroom with a kitchen in it.). And it was exactly what you pay for. The hotel had that “just cleaned carpet smell” about it and the rooms were a bit dated. There was just the bare minimum items in the kitchen with some plates, four knives and forks, pans, coffee maker, toaster and big fridge, also the smoke alarm was next to the cooker. I was to afraid to use the cooker. Which defeated the idea of self catering? The staff was friendly and helpful. You need a car, as it is a hard walk to where the action is, it means that the hotel is quiet. Great value for what you pay. We were not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Fab holiday”
Reviews.Author: silverdremers
Reviews.Content: Yes this is a fab place to stay ALLthe staff ate very helpful the rooms were cleand every day and you are right on the beach AND WE STAYED THER ALSO IN JUNE 2008.PLUS you have a cafe in the hotel you realy have to youse it the people in it are so entertaning plus it is realy good value HAVE A FAB HOLIDAY

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: Skeldonfamily24
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a very short stay here during the week of June 15th. We planned on staying for two nights at Daytona Beach and picked this Hotel after reading several reviews on tripadvisor. Upon arrival we were pleasantly greeted by the personnel at the front dest. We had originally rented a City View apartment for 2 nights as we were traveling with 4 teenagers and thought this would be the ideal place for us even though we would not have a view of the ocean. While we were checking in we were told that the room we rented was not available because of some things that needed minor repairs so they were moving us up to the penthouse. What?!? Are you kidding me?? What a pleasant surprise. They put us up on the top floor with an ocean view at no extra cost. What a way to start your vacation. The room was absolutely beautiful and the view was even better. I found the hotel to be in a very convenient location. We were able to access the Publix for a few groceries and our older children even walked downtown during the day and did a little bit of shopping for themselves. My only regret is that we didn't plan more time at the beach. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Ocean View”
Reviews.Author: rayjaime
Reviews.Content: Got a sweet view of the Atlantic Ocean. Even with a king bed there was still a lot room ro move around. Lots of TV channels. Had to watch alot of TV because of the tropical storms in the area (can't control weather). Didn't get a chance to swim, but it was still pretty warm. The people running the restaurant were very interesting and entertaining. Only problem we had was our air conditioning did not run properly. So we had our balcony door open the whole night... the waves were pretty rough, during our whole stay, so our room got pretty misty. Overall was a good stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolute relaxation”
Reviews.Author: travelqt
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a two night stay at this hotel. It was a very pleasant weekend. When we first arrived we were given a room right by the elevator. We requested another room as I am a very light sleeper and the noise would have kept me up all night. The staff were very accomodating and immediately reassigned us. Our room was an oceanfront with a kitchenette. It had a 4 burner electric stove and oven, sink, refrigerator, 2 coffee makers (individual cup and multi-cup), toaster microwave. In addition, there were dishes and silverware settings for four. Everything was clean and in good operating condition. The hotel supplied a dishrag, a drying towel, dish soap and a dish drainer. The cooking utensils included 2 saucepans, a fry pan, a broiler tray, a collander, a spatula and a can opener. They thought of nearly everything! My husband and I travel quite a bit, so we always take our picnic backpack with us. The only thing we used from it this time was our wine glasses (there are no glasses in the room, although they do supply the standard plastic cups and ice bucket, and coffee cups). The staff were really friendly, and the grounds were well kept. We really enjoyed sitting out by the pool and looking out on the ocean. They also have an indoor pool. The cafe was good food at an incredibly reasonable price. We can't wait to book our next stay!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel for those who don't like crowds!!”
Reviews.Author: twwrt
Reviews.Content: This hotel was perfect for my husband and I. We spent three days here and LOVED IT!!! The place was clean, the people VERY FRIENDLY!! And the breakfast at the Poolside Cafe was awesome. They even have beach chairs and sand toys for those who like to build sand castles. On the north end of Daytona and close to good restaurants and shoping.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, and two great experiences!”
Reviews.Author: LisaOPfl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Tropial winds twice. Once the end of April for one night and again for two nights over mothers day wkend. We were placed in the hotel thru a travel package and I'm so glad because the experience was GREAT! We took good friends with us and all of us were treated very well! Safaa was on duty the first time and she arranged for all of us to be near to each other and to have the type of room each couple wanted when we returned two wks later. She was also on duty on our return and was always so kind and helpful. Franz was the cafe owner and he was a "hoot" to say the least. The food there is awesome and very reasonably priced! The rooms have been updated and are very comfortable. So overall this is a great place for a beach retreat!

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: phyllisjax
Reviews.Content: We've just returned from a short two day stay at the Tropical Winds Oceanfront Hotel. What a wonderful, relaxed stay we had! From the front desk to the ocean, we could not have asked for a better time. The hotel staff was so obliging, helpful and pleasant. The cafe is very reasonably priced and the waiter, Franz, is Mr. Funny Man himself. He had tears coming from our eyes, we laughed so much. The jokes never stopped. If you stay at the hotel, make sure you go to the cafe. It's open for breakfast and lunch. I think it's open until 2:00 p.m. Lots of food for just a little money. We had a direct ocean view room with a balcony, also queen beds, and a small kitchenette. The beds were comfortable and we were very pleased with the entire experience and will go back again. Jim and Phyllis Jacksonville, Fla.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely a 1 star dump!”
Reviews.Author: StephenNPhx_Az
Reviews.Content: We purchased a travel package meaning we would need to attend a 90 minute tour - beware - 90 minutes mean 2 hours of high pressure sales! By agreeing to the 90 minute tour we would be upgraded to a 4 star, Ocean front efficiency room (microwave, stove, refrigerator) right on the beach. Great location...we were right on the beach. The hotel was horrible. Ripped carpets, horrible smell from teh shower curtain, old soap bars in the shower, tile and grout coming out, sliding glass door that took 2 people to open or shut so the door would not fall out, we were able to see the ocean when the wind blew for there were 3 palm trees the covered our balcony, the indoor pool water was brown...it was finally cleaned the Monday we left, we could not get rid of the flies in the room... We were sold a bill of goods. Avoid this hotel and Great Times Vacations!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is a gem.....”
Reviews.Author: MikeKFlorida
Reviews.Content: I decided to book and stay here based on the reviews I read on Trip Advisor as I have not been to Daytona for a couple years. To my fellow reviewers who recommended this hotel, Thank You. From check in to check out I had a great experience here in the 4 nights I stayed. Very helpful and friendly staff, clean, comfortable room right on the beach, nice large balcony, great pool area, restauarant on site for breakfast and lunch( fun place to vist!) and a very affordable price, cannot ask for a better experience for a long weekend!! I will be back......

Reviews.Title: “Great value for a family of 6!!”
Reviews.Author: Kristalyn326
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel wiht my husband and our 4 children (ages 3, 4, 5, and 6) for the weekend. We stayed in the city view apartment and it was perfect for us. We purchased food to cook in the kitchen and saved lots of money. The hotel staff was very nice and even let us check in early because our room was already avaiable. It was directly on the beach and all the shops were located just a short distance away. It is also located right near the Dayton Lagoon waterpark. It was a great stay and we will definately be staying the again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: smiley12Ma
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the hotel for 4 days and could not of asked for anything better. Very friendly staff.Rooms are very clean.Stayed in oceanfront room which was fabulous.Would stay there again. Have breakfast therethe waiters are funny.

Reviews.Title: “Worth it!”
Reviews.Author: beachbum1420
Reviews.Content: We stayed during Bike Week. The staff was so helpful and nice. We were even allowed tokeep our trailor there . We had a room on the 5th floor. All was clean and maids were there ever day and always asked if there was else we needed. Our room had small mirowave & stove,kitchen sink and refrigerator. There was vending and ice machines on the first floor. There was also a computer that you could use in lobby area at anytime. The resturant had unbelievable prices. They are open for breakfast and lunch. the pool area was well keep. But, it turned out to cool to swim.This is an olderhotl but very well maintained. The only negative is there are no stores or resturants within walking distance. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: ubrew
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay for 5 days. The rooms are spotless clean and well maintained. Got a good deal booking through Westjet.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: defence
Reviews.Content: Best bang for your buck. Very accomadating and friendly staff. This isn't the Ritz Carlton, but for what you pay, the rooms are very clean, the location is top notch, it's quiet at night, and the guy who pours your coffee is very entertaining. I would definitly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: LaRobley
Reviews.Content: We had a great time here. Room was very clean and comfortable great staff and the indoor pool was a plus. Nice Ocean Front room.

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful time!!”
Reviews.Author: Yenrab-Lledwod
Reviews.Content: The Taj Mahal, no! But the rooms were clean and our ocean front room had a nice balcony from which we could enjoy the sun and sea. The rooms were clean and had all the accoutrements one would need. The property does have a budget orientation but it quickly became apparant that the staff and service were top shelf. I would reccomend it for any one but it will appeal most to those who are looking for great value. One mistake we did make was not trying the small restaurant until the last day. It was a little gem with very good food and great service for a lunch or breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised but good surprised”
Reviews.Author: Darren_13_13
Reviews.Content: We arrived on the 11th of November and will be leaving on the 13th. To echo the thoughts of someone else.......don't judge a book by its cover until you had the chance to view it. Granted the lobby area is small........but who books a hotel room to spend it in the lobby? Not me. The balcony is a little small but plenty big for two adults to sit out and enjoy the warm weather and watch the sights (beautiful sunrise). The restaurant staff and food was top notch. if you are on a tight budget and enjoy eating out from time to time you will be pleased to know that the food is very cheaply priced but yet, quite good, especially the breakfast sandwich. Two can dine for under $10 for breakfast or lunch. The pool is a great lounging area in the morning and early afternoon.............this time of year because the days are shorter and in the late afternoon the hotel blocks the sun from the pool area. This is not a huge problem becuase by this point in the day you have had enough sun and are ready for a stroll down the beach. If you still desire to swim in a pool there is a small indoor pool that can be used. As for our room (411), it was a nice room with an Oceanview and it was quite large. Much to our surprise the carpet was in pretty good shape, next to new I would say. There was a king sized bed with a day bed if you had a guest or child with you. The bathroom was a little old but the floor tile was in new condition. The shower didn't have the pressure that one would like but again it was adequate to get the job done. The bar fridge was handy for keeping our water, beer and diet pepsi cold. Parking was not an issue. The staff that we encountered were all very friendly and helpful from the moment we checked in. The lady who checked us in and the gentleman who was there in the evening were all willing to chat and provide advice. The restaurant staff can not do enough to help out, they even provide some humour at no additional charge. The lady working maintenance was the most cheerful person working there. We thought we had an issue with our remote and she was there to help us out almost before we hung up the phone. There should be a law against having that much energy. Overall, we are completely satisfied with our stay. Darren from Nova Scotia

Reviews.Title: “Don't judge a book by it's cover”
Reviews.Author: waytogogirl
Reviews.Content: I received a great off season rate. When we arrived my first impression was "oh no, I think I made a mistake" because the outside of the hotel is rather plain and a bit run down. The balconies looked very small and there was nothing appealing about the entrance area either. We walked in and the reception area was very stark and basic. The attendant was not very warm. I was getting even more apprehensive about my choice. But once handed the key and finding the room, things went uphill from there. The room was an ocean view king. It was much larger than I expected. The bed was comfortable. The bathroom updated with a marble countertop. There was a fridge, coffee maker and a small couch. I decided for the price we paid it was really pretty nice afterall. The outdoor pool was nice and the cafe for breakfast was really good and friendly. I would stay here again and I am happy to say that my first impression was not right !!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: voltmeter2
Reviews.Content: We came to Flordia because our son is going to school in Orlando this fall. I booked four nights at this hotel. I did not care for Orlando the first time we were in Flordia so we wanted to try Daytona. We found this hotel to be everything we needed and much more. I cannot say enough good things about it. We liked it so much we booked the room for an extra night. The staff was just super. We did not like the room location next to the pool ,no problem they moved us the next day. The cleaning staff was great and again cannot say enough good things about the Restaurant/Coffee Shop those guys do a wonderful job. The food was good and prices cannot be beat! They had the best coffee I have ever drank at a hotel! If in Daytona again will be back!!!!! Hope it is soon!!! If you want a very nice room and great beach location this is it.

Reviews.Title: “WOW What a Great Place !!!”
Reviews.Author: k9lady1
Reviews.Content: This is a really great place to stay. Not a Huge Resort, just the perfect size facility to make you feel really at home. Fantastic view from the ocean front rooms with wonderful amenities for the price. Two pools for water fun in almost any weather conditions. The STAFF is Wonderful...Every Single One of Them!!! The room was plenty large for our needs and the kitchen was perfect for our needs. Most our time not spent on our bicycles was spent in the pool...running on the beach...or chillin' out on the balcony. Simply Splendid!!!

Reviews.Title: “Blah!”
Reviews.Author: phillips0005
Reviews.Content: This place was NASTY! the lady at the front counter was NOT nice! All we done was open our door and the room smelled like pie, we tried to get our money back for all three nights I had pay for in Feb, but was told no. We had to stay one night there and got a refund the next morning for the other two days. The pool was a hole in the ground nothing for kids. I was told I would have a ocean view I did not. I would never tell anyone to stay that this place. The only thing we like about it was seeing the door close when we left!

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel for a weekend vacation”
Reviews.Author: thegima
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying we go to Daytona beach every summer for a long weekend vacation. We normally stay at Days Inn Tropical Seas however they were booked so we booked here instead. We booked an ocean front room with king bed. Upon arrival we were able to check in about 2 hours before check-in time which was really nice however they gave us the wrong room. We got sent to an efficiency room with two beds. Went back to the front desk and explained how we had reserved a king bed only to be told we had not. After the lady behind the desk brought out the paperwork and read the reservation she saw that we were right and quickly apologized, gave us a new room with a king bed still before check-in. Room was as expected, decent. Nothing great, nothing bad. The bed wasn't that comfortable but you'll be so tired from being at the beach all day it won't matter. Sheets had a couple rips in them but other than that the room was ok. We chose to not have our room serviced since we were only there two nights, mentioned to the lady cleaning the room that morning that we could use some extra towels. She said she would have to get them, then continued on her business. Didn't think we would see any new towels but we had a bag on our door when we got back from the beach with some new towels. Overall an ok experience, nothing real bad or real good about it. Just average. Would suggest this hotel for anybody going on a short stay. After getting back home and checking online a little bit I found that the Hilton was only about $10-20 more per night than we paid for this hotel. Hope this helps somebody!

Reviews.Title: “ugh..pass this one by”
Reviews.Author: beachgrl61
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for a week online after reading reviews and felt even if it wasn't fancy it would be clean and nice for our family. We booked a room for us and our two daughters. We checked in and went to our rooms and ours smelled horrible!! Can't even describe it. Then our daughters came and said that there was black hair in their tub and later found hair on the sheets of their bed. So gross..We went to the front desk and asked for a refund for our week; they were actually very helpful and nice. We stayed that night because they would not give us that first night's money back and then checked out and they did refund us all of our money. They also offered us another room, but yuk..no thanks. We did eat breakfast in the cafe, super nice guy and good food there. However, we checked into the plaza resort and our stay was incredible!! Plus, it was only a little more expensive and there is no comparison on the two hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, friendly and convenient place to stay”
Reviews.Author: volcanoesfire
Reviews.Content: Description: My husband and I have been dying to visit Daytona Beach. We just got married last year, so we didn't have a lot of money to spend on a hotel. We booked this hotel through expedia after reading the reviews. I was impressed at how friendly the staff was. The only problem that we had was that we booked an "ocean view" king room, which was actually a side view. The "oceon front" double rooms have the best (straight) view of the ocean. Cleanliness: The room was clean and didn't smell. I would suggest some updates in the bathroom, but it was clean. The room had a fridge, microwave, couch and tv. It was nice. Location: It was in a great location on N. Atlantic Ave and everything was only a short drive. The airport (DAB) and Daytona Speedway were across the bridge, maybe a 10 minute drive. Ponce Lighthouse was a longer drive south on Atlantic, but we enjoyed the scenery. There was also a waterpark and a mall (where Bubba Gump Shrimp was located) about 3 miles from the hotel. PS. I would definitely suggest eating at Bubba Gump's. GREAT, no EXCELLENT food!

Reviews.Title: “Don't Recommend Churches to Use this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SOA08
Reviews.Content: We were told that they accept tax exempt forms and we faxed it 3 weeks prior to going to the hotel. No one and I stress, no one contacted us and informed us that they do not accept the form we had. The whole time we were there, no one told us they do not accept our form. One of the rooms had a whole in the wall, that we were charged for and torn sheets that no one could tell us which room it was in. We were charged after we left for taxes and for the whole in the wall that was already there. The manager would not contact the IRS about the form being legit. The hotel itself was clean, the pools were clean and the beach was nice. No crowds at all. But I would not recommend this hotel to churches if you are planning on using your tax exempt forms. Anyone else who stay in room 506 the whole was already in the wall by the air conditioner, so if they try and charge your for it, you seen it first on this review. They had it covered by plaster, NO drywall and if you lean up agaist it , which is what happened, it will reopen the whole. Watch your account. This is how we knew they charged us for all of this. Once again, watch your account when you leave and go home.

Reviews.Title: “Warning about rates!”
Reviews.Author: pokerplr
Reviews.Content: After looking at rates on the property's site, I called the hotel directly. I was asked if I had already been quoted a rate , I mentioned the rate on the site and was told that they could match that rate. The next morning we decided to check the rate and stay another night. I called down to the front desk and was asked the rate I paid for the past night. Clerk said that she could match that rate. I then had someone else call in and ask for the rate for that night and he was quoted a rate $40 less than I was!! Other than that we did like this hotel and would stay again. Our view from the oceanfront balcony was beautiful!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: mittens82755
Reviews.Content: i stayed again this past week in may 2008 at the tropical winds oceanfront hotel daytona beach. i looked at another before deciding to go back. once i checked out others i felt the tropical winds is where i wanted to be again. this was my 2nd stay there and each time is better then the last. this time i took an oceanfront efficiency. best move i made. the front desk gal was so nice and cheerful upon checking in. i was hrs early due to the flight in . she gave me a room right away. the room was awesome. it was like a dream come true. facing the ocean. the room was very clean. the housekeeping staff were wonderful. rooms done early . they wont wake you to clean the room and change the towels.they wait till you are gone out. the cafe downstairs is a wonderful place to have breakfast & lunch. they are so reasonable. i thought it to be cheaper then go to a restaurant to eat. the pool area is real clean. the maint. dept does a thorough job keeping it clean.there is internet computer in the lobby for the guests. they just ask you to limit to 15 mins if someone is waiting or comes down to use the computer. that is a reasonable request. i have now made tropical winds my vacation home. the hotel may not be the newest but it sure is a great place . to me the newer hotels, taller ones and ones with big names like the hilton are more costly. you are paying for the names. again thankyou expedia for listing tropical winds on your site. i found them thru your hotels listing 2 yrs ago and i am glad i chose this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Heaven is a place on Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: TheGlee's
Reviews.Content: My husband and I chose this resort after having read the reviews on TA. (Thank heavens for TA!!) Thank you to all the people who have stayed here and shared their views. But we didn’t book it, we decided to take a chance when we arrived. There are so many choices of where to stay we could so easily have got it wrong. So we wanted to ‘vet’ the room first. Gwen was the first person we came into contact with in reception, we asked if we could see an oceanfront room - she didn’t hesitate in giving us the key to 310. It was an efficiency, lovely clean, fresh oceanfront view on the 3rd floor, with the sound of the ocean in your room. We only checked in for 2 nights initially, but afteit’s right on the beach, so we decided to stay here for the duration. We asked Gwen if the room was available for the time we wanted, it was, and the rates she quoted became cheaper per night the longer we stayed. Very happy with our choice, it really made our time in Daytona very pleasant. Also the sunrise is amazing, what a lovely way to start the day. Aircon/heating works a treat. It was a little cold during our stay, so the heating was a bonus for one day. The Coffee bar/café on the ground floor is a lovely place for breakfast and lunch, either eat in there or ‘to go’ if you are round the pool. We had breakfast here on our first morning, it was delicious with lots of choices, and the wonderful man who served us is a real charmer, very friendly and a great host. Our room was serviced daily and very early too, we went out for breakfast about 7:30 every day, and didn’t get back till late afternoon, so much to see and do in Daytona. But on one occasion we came back around 9:30 - 10:00am and couldn’t believe our room had been done already!! Wonderful. We had clean towels every day, 2 queen sized beds which we found to be extremely comfortable - even the pillows were perfect. There are beach towels available as you go thru to the pool area, plenty of sun loungers available and access to the incredible Daytona Beach. This is the only place I would stay when I return, and next time I would book it, as Gwen told us we would get even better rates as we are repeaters. We chatted to nearly all the staff here , we found them to be very friendly people, always willing to pass the time with you. We rented a car from Alamo in Orlando, it was a Chevy trailblazer SUV, managed to do a lot of what we wanted to do, and as we had to drive from here to Atlanta airport on our last day, the 6 hour journey was a definite breeze, easy driving for my husband… but I think it was more down to my fantastic navigating!! We were given brilliant maps at the Atlanta Welcome Centre too which took us into ‘car rental row’ at Atlanta Airport to return our car to Alamo. We stopped for lunch and didn’t make one mistake. Driving on Daytona Beach:- We did this with everyone else, but we drove ALL the way along, what a laugh, an RV had churned up the sand at the quieter end of the beach, guess what, we got stuck in that soft sand - right in the middle of a family beach party. While we were debating exactly how to get out of this. 2 American guys sitting with their family on the beach and 2 local boys in a pick-up came along, and before we knew it, they all pushed us out!! Thank you very much, if any of you read this for getting us out, but the guys all said this wasn’t the first time and it won’t be the last. Needless to say we didn’t drive along the beach again. Next time we will get a proper 4 x 4 and try again. We love this place and the people - it is such a fun place, and the food! But I will be writing about food in the forum. We found a Chevy dealer selling tons of corvettes, We own/drive one in the UK, so that was great to see them all. Places we went to:- Inlet Harbour, Ocean Walk, , Flagler Beach, St Augustine for a nice drive out, So many eateries (as you do in America) So much still left for another time soon!

Reviews.Title: “This was a great surprise!!!”
Reviews.Author: mother70
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here for a week. The hotel's location was great with private balcony overlooking ocean. Kitchenette was great for saving money. The pools (outdoor/indoor) were clean and nice. The rooms were clean,beds comfortable. Will definately go back. Had teenagers who were happy with it.

Reviews.Title: “It was just what we wanted!!”
Reviews.Author: chickyburd
Reviews.Content: 4 of us came here and stayed in the Sunset View Apartments over spring break. This place pleasantly surprised us! The room was very clean and the staff was REALLY nice, they even arranged for us to have a later check-out time. It's prime location and was extremely reasonably priced. The little cafe is absolutely adorable too. I would DEF. recommend staying here to anyone who's not looking to break the bank but still wants a nice, clean place to stay. I'm sure i'll be back there again!

Reviews.Title: “Had a Great Time!”
Reviews.Author: Steve821
Reviews.Content: If you want to be right on the beach, and not spend a fortune, this is a great hotel! It looks to have been recently updated. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Great oceanside pool! Indoor heated pool too! The onsite cafe serves an inexpensive breakfast & lunch menu. Kitchenette helps to save some $$$ as well on the food bill. The only problem I had was the hallway (4th floor) had a bit of a musty smell... but maybe that comes with being on the beach? If you're looking for luxurey, this ain't it... but for a good clean room with fantastic beach access, this one is well worth the money!!!

HotelInfo.Name: Tropical Winds Oceanfront Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 1398 North Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32018
